cards.title: The Infernal Choir
setup: At the start of the game, {TheInfernalChoir} enters play, “Unfinished Business“ side up.
Search the villain deck for the card “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ and play it face-up in the play area of a random hero.
Put the card “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“ off to the side. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: If the Hero with the “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ in it's play area has no cards in it's deck, shuffle all cards under “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ back into the hero's deck, replace “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ with “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“, and {TheInfernalChoir} flips.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck. Then {TheInfernalChoir} deals each non-ghost, non-villain target 1 infernal damage.
flippedGameplay: Redirect all hero damage that would be dealt to villain targets during the villain turn to the hero target with the highest HP.
At the start of the villain turn, remove all but the bottom 5 cards of each hero's deck from the game, then destroy each hero character whose deck contains no cards.
Play the top card of the villain deck and each hero deck in order in turn order. Remove all hero cards played this way from the game at the end of the villain turn.
cards.flippedAdvanced: At the start of each player's turn, remove the top card of their deck from the game.

openingLines.default: You're surprised there are ghosts in organized crime? Let us show why it's called the “criminal underworld“...
openingLines.TerminusCharacter: Your talent is wasted, working for the Conductor. Join me, Daiyu.
openingLines.MinistryOfStrategicScienceTerminusCharac: So you found a gang to work for, after all. It's certainly bringing out your better side.
openingLines.FutureTerminusCharacter: Interesting choice of weapons, but such toys will not save you.

cards.title: Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart
body: This card is indestructible. Cards underneath this one are not in play and have no game text.
When {TheInfernalChoir} would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and instead move a card for each damage that would have been dealt from the bottom of this Hero's deck to beneath this card.
If this Hero is Incapacitated or this card leaves play, the heroes lose. [b]Game over[/b].

flavorQuotes.text: My ethereal heart{BR}is tucked away inside one of flesh{BR}and blood. Don't you see? You can't{BR}beat me without destroying yourself.

cards.flavorReference: The Infernal Choir, End of the Line #30

cards.title: Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed
body: This card is indestructible.
If a player would draw, play, or discard cards from an empty deck, nothing happens instead.

flavorQuotes.text: My ethereal heart{BR}is tucked away inside one of flesh{BR}and blood. Don't you see? You can't{BR}beat me without destroying yourself.

cards.flavorReference: The Infernal Choir, End of the Line #30

cards.title: Bane of Embers
body: Whenever this card is dealt damage, it becomes immune to damage until the end of the turn.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the {H} hero targets with the highest HP X cold damage each, where X is the current HP of this card.

flavorQuotes.text: No sign of forced entry.{BR}You're sure the killers were here?

cards.title: Bane of Iron
body: Reduce damage dealt by hero characters whose play area does not contain “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ by 1.
When this card is destroyed, destroy {H} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Metal rusts, my friend. If your{BR}syndicate wants to upgrade to ethereal{BR}weapons, you'll have to deal with me.

cards.title: Beneath the Flesh
cards.body: Whenever a hero character is dealt 3 or more damage at once, put the top 1, 2, or 3 cards of their deck into their trash. That hero may deal themself X infernal damage and put one of those cards into play, where X is the number of cards that entered their trash this way. If they do, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Let's have a look at the real you.

cards.flavorReference: Red Sun Xu, Full Moon Express #13

cards.title: Dancheng the Giant
cards.body: Whenever a hero draws a card, {TheInfernalChoir} deals them 4 infernal damage. They may discard that card to reduce that damage by 3.
cards.flavorText: “We've got to escape,” said the Harpy.{BR}“But I can't remember from what.”

cards.title: Eclipse
cards.body: At the end of the villain turn, {TheInfernalChoir} deals the hero with the most cards in their trash 3 infernal damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Whichever way{BR}I shift, it's dark out!
I fear this night is{BR}far from over.

cards.title: Haunting Nocturne
body: When this card enters play, if Eclipse is not in play, search the villain trash and deck for it and put it into play, then shuffle the villain deck.
Increase damage dealt by {TheInfernalChoir} by 1.
cards.flavorText: Throughout the city,{BR}everyone had the same nightmare. A{BR}mournful song, and an unseen singer{BR}growing ever closer.

cards.title: Infernal Elegy
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
The first time each turn that an environment card is destroyed, put a random Ghost card from the villain trash into play.

flavorQuotes.text: She's got bigger plans than just{BR}this city. But it'll do for a start.

cards.title: Kata Michi
body: Increase damage dealt by hero characters whose play area contains “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ by 1.
Replace all powers on hero character cards with the following power:
[b]Power:[/b] Each hero target and each Ghost{BR}       deals itself 2 cold damage.
cards.flavorText: Buried long ago on a{BR}distant island, the ghost called Kata{BR}Michi trekked for years across the{BR}ocean, desperate to escape its{BR}reckoning.

cards.title: Moon Eater
body: Each player puts the top 1, 2, or 3 cards of their deck into their trash, then each hero deals themselves 5-X cold damage where X is the number of cards put into that hero's trash this way.
If “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“ is in play, X is twice that number instead.

flavorQuotes.text: The moon itself shall{BR}be our death mask. Not even the{BR}Conductor will be able to banish{BR}our Choir from this world!

cards.title: No Witnesses
body: {TheInfernalChoir} deals the {H - 1} hero characters with the lowest HP 3 infernal damage each.
1 hero dealt damage this way draws a card. Each other hero dealt damage this way discards a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Crime is wasted on the living.

cards.flavorReference: The Infernal Choir, Shallow Earth One-shot

cards.title: Red Sun Xu
body: Each Equipment card in play now has a maximum HP of 1 and gains the keyword 'Ghost.'
At the end of the villain turn, {H - 1} hero targets deal themselves 3 psychic damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: That sword was never yours.{BR}Twelve generations held it before you,{BR}and they rise to reclaim it.

cards.title: The Voices Gather
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a target is revealed, put it into play, and discard the other revealed cards.
That target deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} psychic damage. If “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“ is in play, each player draws a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Do you hear something?{BR}Or several somethings?

cards.title: True Colors
body: {TheInfernalChoir} deals the hero target with the highest HP 6 infernal damage.
If “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“ is in play, {TheInfernalChoir} deals the hero target with the highest HP 6 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You dug up my soul, Daiyu.{BR}Let me return the favor!

cards.flavorReference: The Infernal Choir, Full Moon Express #24

cards.title: Wretched Symphony
body: Reduce damage dealt to {TheInfernalChoir} by 1.

At the end of the villain turn, if “Vagrant Heart: Soul Revealed“ is in play, restore each Ghost to its maximum HP. Otherwise, the hero whose play area contains “Vagrant Heart: Hidden Heart“ deals each other hero character 2 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: It takes a lot to make my blood{BR}freeze. So, good job, I guess.
